title: The Crabby Angels No Bullshit Guide to Peace, Joy and Prosperity: 12 weeks of daily miracles
description: The 4th book in the Crabby Angels series pushing the envelope even more in cutting through religious and spiritual hangups in order to be, do and have the life you choose. With many quotes from A Course in Miracles, this book can help you get more out of life without suffering, struggle, sacrifice or guilt. You deserve to be happy, prosperous and to have the peace of God. Jacob Glass channels these Crabby Angels who pull no punches in knocking down sacred cows in order to experience more freedom. Each entry is just a page or so and you don't have to start at the beginning. You can "plop" it open to any page and let that be your guide for that day or moment - easy peasy.
author: Jacob Glass
